item.title: Hard to explain, please see post
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

well, sorry for the undescriptive title of my topic, but it’s hard to explain the the title. I was simply wondering if there was a way to make something automaticly appear in from of my chat text. For example, adding a / before everything i say. so basicly, when i type into the chat box: Hello everyone! it would come out as /Hello everyone! … does that make any sense? could i set a command to where it would from then on do that? or…something along those lines…something like this:

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“chat”) && p.username.equals(“myname”)) {
String yellText = playerCommand.substring();
p.frames.sendMessage(pz, “<img=1><col=ff000><shad=0202>[Owner] <col=ff000><shad=0202><img=1>” + Misc.optimizeText(p.username) + “: <col=ff00><shad=0202>” + Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
}
or something…
is there a way i can change the default chat color and all that? to where it would automaticly do it and you wouldn’t have to make a command??? ughhhh!!!

Read full topic
